description:
Since its establishment on Jan. 29, 2010, U.S. Fleet Cyber Command (FCC)/Navy Space Command (NAVSPACE)/U.S. TENTH Fleet (C10F) has grown into an operational force composed of more than 14,000 Active and Reserve Sailors and civilians, organized into 98 commands and Cyber Mission Force units around the globe. 

U.S. Fleet Cyber Command reports directly to the Chief of Naval Operations as an Echelon II command and is responsible for Navy information network operations, offensive and defensive cyberspace operations, space operations and signals intelligence. As such, U.S. Fleet Cyber Command serves as the Navy component command to U.S. Cyber Command, the Navy space component to U.S. Strategic Command, and the Navy’s Service Cryptologic Component Commander under the National Security Agency/Central Security Service. 

U.S. TENTH Fleet is the operational arm of Fleet Cyber Command and executes its mission through a task force structure similar to other warfare commanders. In this role, TENTH Fleet provides operational direction through the command’s Maritime Operations Center located at Fort George Meade, Md. 

What we do:

•	Deliver outcomes across the information environment against our nation’s adversaries.
•	Operate and defend Navy networks and information systems.
•	Support maritime superiority from the sea floor to space.
•	Strengthen and expand partnerships to achieve mission success.

Follow us on Twitter @USFLEETCYBERCOM
name: U.S. Fleet Cyber Command / Navy Space Command / U.S. TENTH Fleet

updates.text:
🌟 Join Our Team: Administrative Specialist Wanted! 🌟

We are excited to announce a new opportunity to join our team as an Administrative Specialist (GG-0301-12) at Fort Meade, MD! This key position will provide vital support to the Defense Intelligence Senior Executive Service (DISES) Tier II leadership at U.S. Fleet Cyber Command/U.S. Navy Cryptologic Office.

What You’ll Do:
◼️ Serve as the Executive Assistant to the Director of the Navy Cryptologic Office.

◼️ Review, analyze, and manage all executive-level correspondence for the NCO.

◼️ Develop, recommend, and implement strategies, plans, and policies to ensure effective operations within the organization.

◼️ Provide guidance and support to NCO leadership and team in managing administrative, manpower, training, and logistical resources.
Manage the capture, documentation, and submission of mission-essential materials to the Service Cryptologic Component (SCC) knowledge base.

Why This Role Matters:
◼️ Contribute directly to national security efforts and impactful projects.
◼️ Collaborate with a dynamic and forward-thinking team.
◼️ Play a critical role in ensuring the efficiency and success of high-level initiatives.

🗓️ Application Deadline: November 20, 2024
Ready to take your career to the next level? Don't miss this incredible opportunity to be part of something impactful!

👉 https://lnkd.in/eWZYBYYa 

#FortMeade #FCC/C10F #Hiring #Navy #AdministrativeSpecialist #CareerOpportunity #NationalSecurity #LeadershipSupport #JobOpening

Happy Veterans Day! 

Today, we honor all who have served and continue to serve across the globe. To our veterans, thank you for your sacrifice, your courage, and your commitment to protecting our freedom. We stand together, today and every day, in gratitude and respect. 

#VeteransDay #ThankYouVeterans #USNavy #HonorAndService

Interested in cyber, intel and IT careers in Honolulu, HI? Send your resume to FCC_C10f_NSAH_RESUME@navy.mil.
 
We are currently hiring for two positions: IT Specialists (Policy & Planning) and Offensive Cyber Ops Fires Planner. Click on the images to view job descriptions.
 
#FleetCyberCommand #FCC #NavySpace #NAVSPACE #TENTHFleet #IntelJobs #CyberJobs #STEMJobs #ITJobs

🌟 Join Our Team: Manpower Analyst Wanted! 🌟

 Are you passionate about supporting critical missions and driving impactful change? We’re looking for a talented Manpower Analyst (GG-0343-13) to join our dynamic team at Fort Meade, MD!

In this exciting role, you’ll be at the heart of key assessments and studies that shape manpower strategies across the DoD, USCYBERCOM, and Navy systems. Your work will directly influence the future of cybersecurity and defense operations!

What You’ll Do:
🔍 Conduct comprehensive manpower studies to identify and document essential staffing needs
 📊 Work closely with military and cybersecurity teams to optimize manpower across critical programs
 📈 Analyze data to improve workforce efficiency and mission readiness

Why This Role Matters:
Play a vital part in supporting national security efforts
Contribute to high-level projects with real-world impact
Be part of a forward-thinking team in a collaborative environment

🗓️ Deadline: Apply by November 18, 2024 to seize this amazing opportunity!
Ready to take your career to the next level? Apply now and join us in making a difference!

Apply here 👉 https://lnkd.in/e2t9Ke9M

#FortMeade #FCC/C10F #Hiring #Navy #Manpower #Analyst

November is National Native American Heritage Month, during which we observe, highlight and celebrate the rich history, cultural traditions, and contributions of the Native American community to our Nation and Navy.
 
This year’s theme, “Affirming Native Voices: Visibility-Leadership-Service,” resonates deeply with the Navy’s workforce values. The theme captures three key values – Visibility, Leadership, and Service – that are not only essential to the observance but also to the Navy and its mission.
 
Interested in doing dynamic work? Interested in a meaningful career? Interested in joining our team? Check out www.usajobs.gov and use the search terms: Fleet Cyber Command and U.S. Fleet Forces Command. You can also email your resume to FCC_C10f_NSAH_RESUME@navy.mil.
 
#FleetCyberCommand #FCC #NavyCyber #NavySpace #NAVSPACE #TENTHFleet #IntelJobs #CyberJobs #STEMJobs #NationalNativeAmericanHeritageMonth #DiversityMatters #MeaningfulCareers #BIGNavy #USNavy

We are currently #hiring for a GG-0301-13, INFORMATION OPERATIONS (IO) PLANNER in Fort Meade, MD. The job announcement closes on September 30, 2024. 

You will serve as an INFORMATION OPERATIONS (IO) PLANNER in the Information Operation Branch, Information Related Capabilities Division - Operations Directorate of US FLEET CYBER COMMAND.
